article_title: Why HealthCare.gov Was Desperate to Switch Hosting Providers

article_metadata.author: Drew Hendricks

og.description: The last three months of 2013 were a roller coaster for Healthcare.gov, as the Department of Health and Human Services (HHS) struggled with network outages on Terremark, a subsidiary of Verizon, while juggling self-imposed deadlines for policy enrollments and payments. On November 27, 2013, The HHS signed a contract with [...]
